# joy-product-tour-trigger



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                   | Attribute      | Description                                                                                | Type                  | Default     |
| -------------------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `productTour` _(required)_ | `product-tour` | The ID of the product tour you want to show. Required *                                    | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `showOnLoad`               | `show-on-load` | If `true` the product tour will be displayed immediately *                                 | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `step`                     | `step`         | For dialogs containing joy-indicators with multiple steps, you can specify a step number * | `number / undefined` | `undefined` |
| `target`                   | `target`       | Target of the trigger. If none given, it will be this component. *                         | `string / undefined` | `undefined` |
